nodes.text: Zora Sasori was a Force-sensitive Human female who served as a warrior during the reign of the Galactic Empire.

Following the Battle of Yavin, she teamed with other Force-sensitives searching for a holocron at the Well of Shadows. They were pursued by Sor Venge, an Inquisitor who was also seeking the holocron. When the group arrived at the Well of Shadows, they discovered Kasuni Tamm, a latent Force-sensitive Togruta explorer already there with the holocron. The group came under attack by Venge and his stormtroopers but Sasori was able to escape with Tamm and the others.
Sasori wielded a lightsaber that emitted a blue blade.
Zora appears in the introductory story and gameplay example for Fantasy Flight Games' roleplaying game book 2015 Star Wars: Force and Destiny Core Rulebook.
